title: Urban Meyer Has Made a Mess in Jacksonville. Plus: Fangio and Harbaugh Have Beef, and the Chargers Continue to Roll.
description:
Jason, James, and Ryan start by discussing the Chargers' victory over the Raiders on 'Monday Night Football.' (0:45) Then they provide their thoughts on the war of words between Broncos coach Vic Fangio and Ravens coach John Harbaugh (17:01). Then they discuss all of the Urban Meyer news, the Cowboys' impressive start to the season, and James's Packers beating Ryan's Steelers (26:45).
Hosts: Jason Goff, James Jones, and Ryan Shazier
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
